root.name: Croc 2
root.description: OverviewCroc returns in this sequel of the original Croc game. Baron Dante has returned, as witnessed by a Professor Gobbo in a ritual by the evil Dantinis. When Croc was playing with his friends, he receives a message that has a crocodile feet sign, thinking it might be his parents. His Gobbo friends build him a catapult and Croc begins his quest to find his parents.N64, Sega Saturn and Dreamcast ports were in development, but never released.
